PicketLink ${project.version}
=========================

PicketLink provides a number of features for securing your Java EE6 application.


Contents of distribution
========================

 artifacts/
 
   PicketLink libraries

 doc/

   API Docs and reference guide.
  
 examples/

   PicketLink Examples
  
 lib/

   Library dependencies for this module
   
 source/
 
   Source code for this module
  
Licensing
=========

 This distribution, as a whole, is licensed under the terms of the Apache
 Software License, Version 2.0 (ASL).

PicketLink URLs
==================

PicketLink Home Page:          http://www.jboss.org/picketlink
Downloads:                     
Forums:                        
Source Code:                   git://github.com/picketlink/picketlink.git
Issue Tracking:                http://jira.jboss.org/jira/browse/PLINK

Release Notes
=============

Version 3.0.0 Alpha 1
---------------------
First alpha release of PicketLink 3.x.
